featured.text: In the face of this tragedy, food and other supplies from around the world landed in the provincial capital of Kerman on Sunday.

definition.zh_def: 克爾曼（Kerman）是一個位於伊朗的城市，以其手工地毯和豐富的歷史而聞名。
definition.en_def: Kerman is a city in Iran known for its handmade carpets and rich history.
definition.example: The Kerman carpets are famous for their intricate designs and craftsmanship.
